				      </lnci:caseref>
				    </lnci:case>
				    <lnci:content>
				      <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/cases/urn:contentItem:3S3J-XTG0-003G-3182-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
					<request xmlns="">
					  <parameters>
					    <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#111#3#000175#000075#"/>
					    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:anchoridref" fixed="PAGE_77_3491"/>
					    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="1"/>
					    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:kw-fallback-substring" fixed="#111#3#000175#"/>
					    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="175 Wis. 2d 75"/>
					    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:pinpoint" fixed="77"/>
					    <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360FC0000400"/>
					    <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10984"/>
					    <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
					  </parameters>
					  <linktext> <emph typestyle="un" xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">State v. Keith</emph>, 175 Wis. 2d 75, 77, 498 N.W.2d 865 (Ct. App. 1993)</linktext>
					</request>
				      </linktemplate:linktemplate>
				    </lnci:content>
				  </lnci:cite>
				</rfc:anchorcite>. When the officers ran a routine check on her name, they discovered that there were two outstanding warrants for her arrest. </rfc:reasonforciting></rfc:reasonforciting>
			    <rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND2420000400"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2420000400_2" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/><rfc:anchorcite lni="3S3J-XTG0-003G-3182-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND2420000400" status="valid">
				<ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2410000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
				<lnci:cite ID="I494BJ3K0K1MND4BC0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND4WC0000400" loadable="1" normprotocol="lexsee" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">

				    <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/cases/urn:contentItem:3S3J-XTG0-003G-3182-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">

				      </request>

				  </lnci:content>
				</lnci:cite>
			      </rfc:anchorcite>Keith was arrested and she voluntarily informed the police that she had a gun in her purse.<rfc:anchorcite lni="3S3J-XTG0-003G-3182-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND2420000400" status="valid">

				      <lnci:ldi jumppage="75" kw="2005_175_75*.75" page="75" pagesuffix="*" reporter="2005" volume="175"/>
				    </lnci:caseref>
				    <lnci:caseref ID="I494BP8P0K1MND0S30000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND4WJ0000400">
				      <lnci:ldi jumppage="865" kw="1572_498_865*.865" page="865" pagesuffix="*" reporter="1572" volume="498"/>
				    </lnci:caseref>
				    <lnci:caseref ID="I494BP8P0K1MND0S20000400" anaphref="I493DDGK0K1MND2060000400"/>
				  </lnci:case>
				  <lnci:content>
				    <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/cases/urn:contentItem:3S3J-XTG0-003G-3182-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
				      <request xmlns="">
					<parameters>
					  <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#111#3#000175#000075#"/>
					  <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="1"/>
					  <parameter style="query" name="cfi:kw-fallback-substring" fixed="#111#3#000175#"/>
					  <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="175 Wis. 2d 75"/>
					  <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360FG0000400"/>
					  <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10984"/>
					  <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
					</parameters>
					<linktext> <emph typestyle="un" xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">Id.</emph>
					</linktext>
				      </request>
				    </linktemplate:linktemplate>
				  </lnci:content>
				</lnci:cite>
			      </rfc:anchorcite></rfc:reasonforciting>
			  </text>
			</p>
			<p>
			  <ref:anchor id="fnpara_8" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			  <text>
			    <rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND25B0000400"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND25B0000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>The facts are clear that the defendant did not step out onto the porch from inside the duplex. She was present on the porch after returning from a drive-in theater. <rfc:anchorcite lni="3S3J-XTG0-003G-3182-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND25B0000400" status="valid">
				<ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2590000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
				<lnci:cite ID="I494BP8P0K1MND0S50000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND4WC0000400" loadable="1" normprotocol="lexsee" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
				  <lnci:case>
				    <lnci:caseref ID="I494BP8P0K1MND0W50000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND4WD0000400">
				      <lnci:ldi jumppage="75" kw="2005_175_75*.75" page="75" pagesuffix="*" reporter="2005" volume="175"/>
				    </lnci:caseref>
				    <lnci:caseref ID="I494BP8P0K1MND0W40000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND4WJ0000400">
				      <lnci:ldi jumppage="865" kw="1572_498_865*.865" page="865" pagesuffix="*" reporter="1572" volume="498"/>
				    </lnci:caseref>
				    <lnci:caseref ID="I494BP8P0K1MND0W30000400" anaphref="I493DDGK0K1MND2060000400"/>
				  </lnci:case>
				  <lnci:content>
				    <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/cases/urn:contentItem:3S3J-XTG0-003G-3182-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
				      <request xmlns="">
					<parameters>
					  <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#111#3#000175#000075#"/>
					  <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="1"/>
					  <parameter style="query" name="cfi:kw-fallback-substring" fixed="#111#3#000175#"/>
					  <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="175 Wis. 2d 75"/>
					  <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360FH0000400"/>
					  <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10984"/>
					  <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
					</parameters>
					<linktext> <emph typestyle="un" xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">Id.</emph>
					</linktext>
				      </request>
				    </linktemplate:linktemplate>
				  </lnci:content>
				</lnci:cite>
			      </rfc:anchorcite> According to the State's brief, she told police that she had carried the gun in her purse during her evening out because "you know how men are." Thus, the facts underlying the opinion do not make the <emph typestyle="un">Keith</emph> case an ideal vehicle for interpreting a homeowner's right to possess a firearm. </rfc:reasonforciting>
			  </text>
			</p>
		      </bodytext>
		    </footnote> <ref:page num="794" page-scheme="4922" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> Rejecting the defendant's argument that the "goes armed" language requires a finding of locomotion, the court held that "there is no separate element requiring that a person actually <emph typestyle="un">go</emph> somewhere, and, therefore, carrying a concealed weapon 'does not necessarily import the idea of locomotion.'" <rfc:anchorcite lni="3S3J-XTG0-003G-3182-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND2290000400" status="valid">
		      <ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2280000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		      <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND4W90000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND4W10000400" normprotocol="lexsee" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
			<lnci:case>
			  <lnci:caseref ID="I493DC010K1MND4W80000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND4W20000400">
			    <lnci:ldi jumppage="79" kw="2005_175_75*.79" page="75" pagesuffix="*" reporter="2005" volume="175"/>
			    <lnci:pinpoint num="79"/>
			    <lnci:syllabusnum ID="I4JVTG4Y0K1MNJ4XG0000400" num="4"/>
			  </lnci:caseref>
			  <lnci:caseref ID="I493DDGK0K1MND25G0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND4W40000400" exclude="1" generated="1">
			    <lnci:ldi jumppage="865" kw="1572_498_865*.865" page="865" pagesuffix="*" reporter="1572" volume="498"/>
			    <lnci:syllabusnum ID="I4JVTG4Y0K1MNJ4XH0000400" num="3"/>
			  </lnci:caseref>
			  <lnci:caseref ID="I493DDGK0K1MND25H0000400" anaphref="I493DDGK0K1MND2050000400" exclude="1" generated="1"/>
			</lnci:case>
			<lnci:content>
			  <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/cases/urn:contentItem:3S3J-XTG0-003G-3182-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
			    <request xmlns="">
			      <parameters>
				<parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#111#3#000175#000075#"/>
				<parameter style="query" name="cfi:anchoridref" fixed="PAGE_79_3491"/>
				<parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="1"/>
				<parameter style="query" name="cfi:kw-fallback-substring" fixed="#111#3#000175#"/>
				<parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="175 Wis. 2d 75"/>
				<parameter style="query" name="cfi:pinpoint" fixed="79"/>
				<parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360250000400"/>
				<parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10984"/>
				<parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
			      </parameters>
			      <linktext> <emph typestyle="un" xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">Id.</emph> at 79</linktext>
			    </request>
			  </linktemplate:linktemplate>
			</lnci:content>
		      </lnci:cite>
		      <rfc:anchorheadnote anchorheadnotetoken="I4F247V40K1MND1X50000400" seqnum="3"/>
		    </rfc:anchorcite> (quoting 94 C.J.S. Weapons � 8a (1956)).</rfc:reasonforciting>
		</text>
	      </p>
	      <p xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">
		<ref:anchor id="para_26" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		<text><ref:page num="16" page-scheme="7490" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> <rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND25D0000400" xmlns:rfc="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/legal/reason-for-citing/1/"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND25D0000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/><ref:page num="P23" page-scheme="3481" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> Hamdan contends that <rfc:anchorcite lni="3S3J-XTG0-003G-3182-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND25D0000400" status="valid">
		      <ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND25C0000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		      <lnci:cite ID="I494K3WC0K1MND0KN0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND4W10000400" loadable="1" normprotocol="lexsee" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
			<lnci:case>
			  <lnci:caseref ID="I494K3WC0K1MND0KS0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND4W20000400">
			    <lnci:ldi jumppage="75" kw="2005_175_75*.75" page="75" pagesuffix="*" reporter="2005" volume="175"/>
			  </lnci:caseref>
			  <lnci:caseref ID="I494K3WC0K1MND0KR0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND4W40000400">
			    <lnci:ldi jumppage="865" kw="1572_498_865*.865" page="865" pagesuffix="*" reporter="1572" volume="498"/>
			  </lnci:caseref>
			  <lnci:caseref ID="I494K3WC0K1MND0KP0000400" anaphref="I493DDGK0K1MND2050000400"/>
			</lnci:case>
			<lnci:metadata>
			  <lnci:precedent>
			    <lnci:editletter ID="I494K3WC0K1MND0VV0000400" appliedby="human" comment="Followed by" letter="f"/>
			  </lnci:precedent>
			</lnci:metadata>
			<lnci:content>
			  <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/cases/urn:contentItem:3S3J-XTG0-003G-3182-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
			    <request xmlns="">
			      <parameters>
				<parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#111#3#000175#000075#"/>
				<parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="1"/>
				<parameter style="query" name="cfi:kw-fallback-substring" fixed="#111#3#000175#"/>
				<parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="175 Wis. 2d 75"/>
				<parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360260000400"/>
				<parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10984"/>
				<parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
			      </parameters>
			      <linktext> <emph typestyle="un" xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">Keith</emph> </linktext>
			    </request>
			  </linktemplate:linktemplate>
			</lnci:content>
		      </lnci:cite>
		      <rfc:anchorheadnote anchorheadnotetoken="I4F247V40K1MND1X60000400" seqnum="3"/>
		    </rfc:anchorcite>was wrongly decided. He argues that the CCW statute's use of the term "goes armed" necessitates a requirement of some locomotion on the part of a defendant. Comparing CCW statutes from other states that merely prohibit "carrying" concealed weapons, Hamdan reasons that the "goes armed" language of <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND4WM0000400" normcite="WIS. STAT. 941.23" normprotocol="lexstat" ri.key="44793220023" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
		      <lnci:stat>
			<lnci:statinfo>
			  <lnci:hier>
			    <lnci:hierlev label="section" num="941.23"/>
			  </lnci:hier>
			</lnci:statinfo>
			<lnci:statref normcite="_941.23()">
			  <lnci:standardname normpubcode="6684" value="Wis. Stat."/>
			</lnci:statref>
		      </lnci:stat>
		      <lnci:content>
			<linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/statutes-legislation/urn:contentItem:55B2-G480-004G-W32K-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
			  <request xmlns="">
			    <parameters>
			      <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#6684#116#000941#    23#"/>
			      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="5"/>
			      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="Wis. Stat. � 941.23"/>
			      <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360270000400"/>
			      <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10989"/>
			      <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
			    </parameters>
			    <linktext>Wis. Stat. � 941.23</linktext>
			  </request>
			</linktemplate:linktemplate>
		      </lnci:content>
		    </lnci:cite> represents an <ref:page num="451" page-scheme="3491" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> implied exception for a person's residence or place of business. </rfc:reasonforciting>Under this view, Hamdan did not "go armed" while carrying his weapon because he never left his own store.</text>
	      </p>
	      <p xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">
		<ref:anchor id="para_27" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		<text><ref:page num="P24" page-scheme="3481" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> We reject Hamdan's proposed construction of the CCW statute and continue to adhere to prior interpretations of the "goes armed" language. While Hamdan emphasizes definitions of the verb "go" that discuss movement from point to point and the act of departure, other definitions of "go" or "goes" are more germane to the conduct intended to be prohibited. These definitions equate the act of going armed with the state or condition of performing an action. <footnote>
		    <ref:anchor id="fn_fnote7" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		    <label alt-content="n7">7</label>
		    <bodytext>
		      <p>
			<ref:anchor id="fnpara_9" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			<text>We note the definitions of "go" that include "To pursue a certain course," "To be in a certain condition," and "To continue to be in a certain condition or continue an activity." <emph typestyle="un">The American Heritage Dictionary of The English Language</emph> 775 (3d ed. 1992).</text>
		      </p>
		    </bodytext>
		  </footnote> To illustrate, if Hamdan were to come out of the back room without wearing shoes and socks, he could not deny that he was "going" barefoot.</text>
	      </p>
	      <p xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">
		<ref:anchor id="para_28" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		<text><ref:page num="17" page-scheme="7490" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> <ref:page num="P25" page-scheme="3481" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> Even if we were to accept "locomotion" as a requirement, we fail to see how Hamdan's act of moving around his store would not be an act of "locomotion" under a common understanding of the term. <footnote>
		    <ref:anchor id="fn_fnote8" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		    <label alt-content="n8">8</label>
		    <bodytext>
		      <p>
			<ref:anchor id="fnpara_10" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			<text>"Locomotion" is defined as: "The act of moving from place to place" or "the ability to move from place to place." <emph typestyle="un">The American Heritage Dictionary of The English Language</emph> 1056 (3d ed. 1992).</text>
		      </p>
		    </bodytext>
		  </footnote> We would certainly have no problem finding that a customer was "going armed" if the <emph typestyle="un">customer</emph> moved around Hamdan's store with a pistol concealed in his trousers. More problematic is the fact that Hamdan's "locomotion" theory could limit application of the CCW statute in <ref:page num="452" page-scheme="3491" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> public areas where the weapon or the person was not moving. Hamdan contends otherwise. While the concept of locomotion requires movement from place to place, it does not delineate what spatial dimension is required of a "place." Hamdan defines "place" as being a particular structure (namely, one's home or place of business), and he suggests that only movement outside of that structure is "locomotion" or the act of "going." We find no support for this construction of "goes armed" in the text of the statute.</text>
	      </p>
	      <p xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">
		<ref:anchor id="para_29" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		<text><ref:page num="18" page-scheme="7490" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> <ref:page num="P26" page-scheme="3481" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> Finally, we note that at least one state with a CCW statute that similarly prohibits a person from "going armed" with a concealed weapon has exceptions for those who carry concealed weapons in their own home or place of business. <emph typestyle="un">See</emph> <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND4WN0000400" normcite="IOWA CODE 724.4" normprotocol="lexstat" ri.key="42035600001" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
		    <lnci:stat>
		      <lnci:statinfo>
			<lnci:hier>
			  <lnci:hierlev label="section" num="724.4">
			    <lnci:hierlev label="subsection" num="1"/>
			  </lnci:hierlev>
			</lnci:hier>
		      </lnci:statinfo>
		      <lnci:statref normcite="_724.4(1)">
			<lnci:standardname normpubcode="17271" value="Iowa Code"/>
		      </lnci:statref>
		    </lnci:stat>
		    <lnci:content>
		      <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/contentstore/statutes-legislation" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
			<request xmlns="">
			  <parameters>
			    <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#17271#240#000004#00000724#"/>
			    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:anchoridref" fixed="_1"/>
			    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="5"/>
			    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="Iowa Code � 724.4"/>
			    <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360280000400"/>
			    <parameter style="query" name="filters" fixed=""/>
			  </parameters>
			  <linktext>Iowa Code Ann. �� 724.4(1)</linktext>
			</request>
		      </linktemplate:linktemplate>
		    </lnci:content>
		  </lnci:cite><lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND4WP0000400" loadable="1" normcite="IOWA CODE 724.4" normprotocol="lexstat" ri.key="11429963" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
		    <lnci:stat>
		      <lnci:statinfo>
			<lnci:hier>
			  <lnci:hierlev label="section" num="724.4">
			    <lnci:hierlev label="subsection" num="4">
			      <lnci:hierlev label="subdivision" num="a"/>
			    </lnci:hierlev>
			  </lnci:hierlev>
			</lnci:hier>
		      </lnci:statinfo>
		      <lnci:statref normcite="724.4(4)(a)">
			<lnci:standardname normpubcode="17271" value="Iowa Code"/>
		      </lnci:statref>
		    </lnci:stat>
		    <lnci:content>
		      <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/contentstore/statutes-legislation" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
			<request xmlns="">
			  <parameters>
			    <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#17271#240#000004#00000724#"/>
			    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:anchoridref" fixed="_4_a"/>
			    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="5"/>
			    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="Iowa Code � 724.4"/>
			    <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360290000400"/>
			    <parameter style="query" name="filters" fixed=""/>
			  </parameters>
			  <linktext>, (4)(a)</linktext>
			</request>
		      </linktemplate:linktemplate>
		    </lnci:content>
		  </lnci:cite> (West 1993). If the concept of going armed precluded application of a CCW law while a person was in or on the person's own <ref:page num="795" page-scheme="4922" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> property, these exceptions would be superfluous.</text>
	      </p>
	      <p xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">
		<ref:anchor id="para_30" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		<text><ref:page num="P27" page-scheme="3481" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> We decline to adopt a new construction of the CCW statute based on a revised characterization of the phrase "goes armed." We will not rewrite the CCW statute in the troublesome manner Hamdan advocates. <footnote>
		    <ref:anchor id="fn_fnote9" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		    <label alt-content="n9">9</label>
		    <bodytext>
		      <p>
			<ref:anchor id="fnpara_11" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			<text><rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND2770000400" xmlns:rfc="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/legal/reason-for-citing/1/"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2770000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>Interpreting the "goes armed" language in the manner suggested by Hamdan would, arguably, avoid the constitutional problems with the CCW statute discussed in this opinion. Of course, it is a cardinal rule that courts should avoid interpreting a statute in a way that would render it unconstitutional when a reasonable interpretation exists that would render the legislation constitutional. <emph typestyle="un">See </emph><rfc:anchorcite lni="3VD1-R5T0-0039-42BS-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND2770000400" status="valid">
			      <ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND25F0000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			      <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND4WS0000400" normprotocol="lexsee" ri.key="18855917" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
				<lnci:case>
				  <lnci:caseinfo>
				    <lnci:casename>
				      <lnci:party1 name="Am. Family Mut. Ins. Co."/>
				      <lnci:text txt="v."/>
				      <lnci:party2 name="Wis. Dep't of Revenue"/>
				    </lnci:casename>
				    <lnci:decisiondate txt="1998"/>
				  </lnci:caseinfo>
				  <lnci:caseref ID="I493DC010K1MND4WT0000400">
				    <lnci:reporter normpubcode="111" value="Wis. 2d"/>
				    <lnci:ldi jumppage="667" kw="2005_222_650*.667" page="650" pagesuffix="*" reporter="2005" volume="222"/>
				    <lnci:volume num="222"/>
				    <lnci:page num="650"/>
				    <lnci:pinpoint num="667"/>
				    <lnci:syllabusnum ID="I4JVTG4Y0K1MNJ4XJ0000400" num="4"/>
				  </lnci:caseref>
				  <lnci:caseref ID="I493DC010K1MND4WY0000400">
				    <lnci:reporter normpubcode="630" value="N.W.2d"/>
				    <lnci:ldi jumppage="872" kw="1572_586_872*.872" page="872" pagesuffix="*" reporter="1572" volume="586"/>
				    <lnci:volume num="586"/>
				    <lnci:page num="872"/>
				    <lnci:syllabusnum ID="I4JVTG4Y0K1MNJ4XK0000400" num="9"/>
				  </lnci:caseref>
				  <lnci:caseref ID="I493DDGK0K1MND2070000400" exclude="1" generated="1">
				    <lnci:reporter normpubcode="4135" value="Wisc. LEXIS"/>
				    <lnci:volume num="1998"/>
				    <lnci:page num="276"/>
				  </lnci:caseref>
				</lnci:case>
				<lnci:content>
				  <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/cases/urn:contentItem:3VD1-R5T0-0039-42BS-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
				    <request xmlns="">
				      <parameters>
					<parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#111#3#000222#000650#"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="cfi:anchoridref" fixed="PAGE_667_3491"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="1"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="cfi:kw-fallback-substring" fixed="#111#3#000222#"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="222 Wis. 2d 650"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="cfi:pinpoint" fixed="667"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360FK0000400"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10983"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
				      </parameters>
				      <linktext> <emph typestyle="un" xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">Am. Family Mut. Ins. Co. v. Wis. Dep't of Revenue</emph>, 222 Wis. 2d 650, 667, 586 N.W.2d 872 (1998)</linktext>
				    </request>
				  </linktemplate:linktemplate>
				</lnci:content>
			      </lnci:cite>
			      <rfc:anchorheadnote anchorheadnotetoken="I4F247V40K1MND1X70000400" seqnum="15"/>
			    </rfc:anchorcite>. </rfc:reasonforciting>However, the prerequisite of this rule is that the second possible interpretation is reasonable. We do not find Hamdan's offered interpretation to be reasonable; therefore, it cannot be used to cure a possible constitutional defect in the statute.</text>
		      </p>
		    </bodytext>
		  </footnote></text>
	      </p>
	      <p xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">
		<ref:anchor id="para_31" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		<text><ref:page num="19" page-scheme="7490" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> <ref:page num="453" page-scheme="3491" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> <ref:page num="P28" page-scheme="3481" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> During the time that Hamdan came from the back room and engaged in conversation with the police officers, he was going armed with a concealed and dangerous weapon. Because the jury concluded that Hamdan was aware of the weapon's presence and that the weapon was hidden or concealed from ordinary view, we conclude that Hamdan violated the CCW statute.</text>
	      </p>

STAT. 939.45" normprotocol="lexstat" ri.key="40871500037" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">

			<meta>
			  <metaitem name="appliedby" value="machine"/>

			  <metaitem name="InternalName" value="Necessity"/>

			<topic:topicReference guid:guid="urn:topic:93A07107DF464A99B7E7E0312D8AB32A" xmlns:topic="urn:x-lexisnexis:content:topic:global:1" xmlns:guid="urn:x-lexisnexis:content:guid:global:1"/>

		    <bodytext>
		      <p>
			<ref:anchor id="hnpara_5" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			<text> <lnci:cite ID="I4NVTVB90K1MNJ4HF0000400" loadable="0" normcite="WIS. STAT. 939.45" normprotocol="lexstat" status="valid" validate="0" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
			    <lnci:stat>
			      <lnci:statref normcite="_939.45(1)()">
				<lnci:standardname normpubcode="6684"/>
			      </lnci:statref>
			    </lnci:stat>
			    <lnci:content>
			      <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/statutes-legislation/urn:contentItem:55B2-G480-004G-W2YJ-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
				<request xmlns="">
				  <parameters>
				    <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#6684#116#000939#    45#"/>
				    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:anchoridref" fixed="_1"/>
				    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="5"/>
				    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="Wis. Stat. � 939.45"/>
				    <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R3602S0000400"/>
				    <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10989"/>
				    <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
				  </parameters>
				  <linktext>Wis. Stat. � 939.45(1)</linktext>
				</request>
			      </linktemplate:linktemplate>
			    </lnci:content>
			  </lnci:cite> (1999-2000) permits a defendant charged with a crime a defense of privilege when the actor's conduct occurs under circumstances of necessity so as to be privileged under <lnci:cite ID="I4NVTVB90K1MNJ4HG0000400" loadable="0" normcite="WIS. STAT. 939.47" normprotocol="lexstat" status="valid" validate="0" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
			    <lnci:stat>
			      <lnci:statref normcite="_939.47()">
				<lnci:standardname normpubcode="6684"/>
			      </lnci:statref>
			    </lnci:stat>
			    <lnci:content>
			      <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/statutes-legislation/urn:contentItem:55B2-G480-004G-W2YM-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
				<request xmlns="">
				  <parameters>
				    <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#6684#116#000939#    47#"/>
				    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="5"/>
				    <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="Wis. Stat. � 939.47"/>
				    <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R3602T0000400"/>
				    <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10989"/>
				    <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
				  </parameters>
				  <linktext>Wis. Stat. � 939.47</linktext>
				</request>
			      </linktemplate:linktemplate>
			    </lnci:content>
			  </lnci:cite> (1999-2000). However, the defense of necessity, by its plain language, exists only when a defendant acts in response to "natural physical forces," not human forces that pose potential dangers. The existence of random, albeit frequent, criminal conduct in one's vicinity does not qualify as a "natural physical force" under the law.</text>
		      </p>
		    </bodytext>
		  </casesum:headnote>permits a defendant charged with a crime a defense of privilege "when the actor's conduct occurs under circumstances of . . . necessity so as to be privileged under s. . . . 939.47." <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND4XR0000400" normcite="WIS. STAT. 939.45" normprotocol="lexstat" ri.key="40871500037" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">

		      </lnci:statref>

		    <lnci:content>
		      <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/statutes-legislation/urn:contentItem:55B2-G480-004G-W2YJ-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">

		      </linktemplate:linktemplate>
		    </lnci:content>
		  </lnci:cite><ref:page num="20" page-scheme="7490" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> . <rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND28P0000400" xmlns:rfc="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/legal/reason-for-citing/1/"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND28P0000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/><footnote>
		      <ref:anchor id="fn_fnote10" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		      <label alt-content="n10">10</label>
		      <bodytext>
			<p>
			  <ref:anchor id="fnpara_12" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			  <text><lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND4YD0000400" normcite="WIS. STAT. 939.47" normprotocol="lexstat" ri.key="45163030020" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
			      <lnci:stat>
				<lnci:statinfo>
				  <lnci:hier>
				    <lnci:hierlev label="section" num="939.47"/>
				  </lnci:hier>
				</lnci:statinfo>
				<lnci:statref normcite="_939.47()">
				  <lnci:standardname normpubcode="6684" value="Wis. Stat."/>
				</lnci:statref>
			      </lnci:stat>
			      <lnci:content>
				<linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/statutes-legislation/urn:contentItem:55B2-G480-004G-W2YM-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
				  <request xmlns="">
				    <parameters>
				      <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#6684#116#000939#    47#"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="5"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="Wis. Stat. � 939.47"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360FN0000400"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10989"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
				    </parameters>
				    <linktext>Wisconsin Stat. � 939.47</linktext>
				  </request>
				</linktemplate:linktemplate>
			      </lnci:content>
			    </lnci:cite> provides: </text>
			  <blockquote>
			    <p>
			      <ref:anchor id="fnpara_13" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			      <text>Pressure of natural physical forces which causes the actor reasonably to believe that his or her act is the only means of preventing imminent public disaster, or imminent death or great bodily harm to the actor or another and which causes him or her so to act, is a defense to a prosecution for any crime based on that act, except that if the prosecution is for first-degree intentional homicide, the degree of the crime is reduced to 2nd-degree intentional homicide. </text>
			    </p>
			  </blockquote>
			</p>
			<p>
			  <ref:anchor id="fnpara_14" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			  <text>Hamdan relies only on the necessity defense permitted under <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND4YF0000400" normcite="WIS. STAT. 939.45" normprotocol="lexstat" ri.key="40871500037" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
			      <lnci:stat>
				<lnci:statinfo>
				  <lnci:hier>
				    <lnci:hierlev label="section" num="939.45">
				      <lnci:hierlev label="subsection" num="1"/>
				    </lnci:hierlev>
				  </lnci:hier>
				</lnci:statinfo>
				<lnci:statref normcite="_939.45(1)()">
				  <lnci:standardname normpubcode="6684" value="Wis. Stat."/>
				</lnci:statref>
			      </lnci:stat>
			      <lnci:content>
				<linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/statutes-legislation/urn:contentItem:55B2-G480-004G-W2YJ-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
				  <request xmlns="">
				    <parameters>
				      <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#6684#116#000939#    45#"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:anchoridref" fixed="_1"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="5"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="Wis. Stat. � 939.45"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360FP0000400"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10989"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
				    </parameters>
				    <linktext>Wis. Stat. � 939.45(1)</linktext>
				  </request>
				</linktemplate:linktemplate>
			      </lnci:content>
			    </lnci:cite>; he does not advance a defense premised on coercion, which is also recognized under <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND4YG0000400" normcite="WIS. STAT. 939.45" normprotocol="lexstat" ri.key="40871500037" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
			      <lnci:stat>
				<lnci:statinfo>
				  <lnci:hier>
				    <lnci:hierlev label="section" num="939.45">
				      <lnci:hierlev label="subsection" num="1"/>
				    </lnci:hierlev>
				  </lnci:hier>
				</lnci:statinfo>
				<lnci:statref normcite="_939.45(1)">
				  <lnci:standardname normpubcode="6684" value="Wis. Stat."/>
				</lnci:statref>
			      </lnci:stat>
			      <lnci:content>
				<linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/statutes-legislation/urn:contentItem:55B2-G480-004G-W2YJ-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
				  <request xmlns="">
				    <parameters>
				      <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#6684#116#000939#    45#"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:anchoridref" fixed="_1"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="5"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="Wis. Stat. � 939.45"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360FR0000400"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10989"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
				    </parameters>
				    <linktext>� 939.45(1)</linktext>
				  </request>
				</linktemplate:linktemplate>
			      </lnci:content>
			    </lnci:cite>. </text>
			</p>
		      </bodytext>
		    </footnote> Hamdan claims that <ref:page num="454" page-scheme="3491" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> the unpredictable nature of violence in the neighborhood immediately surrounding his store subjects him and his family to risks that make it necessary for him to keep a concealed weapon in his store. <rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND29C0000400"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND29C0000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>This may be true. However, the defense of necessity, by its plain language, exists only when a defendant acts in response to "natural physical forces," not human forces that pose potential dangers. <emph typestyle="un">See </emph><rfc:anchorcite lni="3S3K-09T0-003G-33JX-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND28P0000400" status="valid">
			<ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND28N0000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			<lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND4XT0000400" normprotocol="lexsee" ri.key="3449784" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">

			    </lnci:caseinfo>
			    <lnci:caseref ID="I493DC010K1MND4XV0000400">
			      <lnci:reporter normpubcode="111" value="Wis. 2d"/>
			      <lnci:ldi jumppage="576" kw="2005_99_572*.576" page="572" pagesuffix="*" reporter="2005" volume="99"/>

			      <lnci:reporter normpubcode="630" value="N.W.2d"/>

			  <lnci:content>
			    <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/cases/urn:contentItem:3S3K-09T0-003G-33JX-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">

				  <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#111#3#000099#000572#"/>

				  <parameter style="query" name="cfi:kw-fallback-substring" fixed="#111#3#000099#"/>

				</parameters>
				<linktext> <emph typestyle="un" xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">State v. Olsen</emph>, 99 Wis. 2d 572, 576, 299 N.W.2d 632 (Ct. App. 1980)</linktext>

			    </linktemplate:linktemplate>
			  </lnci:content>
			</lnci:cite>
		      </rfc:anchorcite>; <emph typestyle="un">see also </emph><rfc:anchorcite lni="3S3J-WXJ0-003G-32XR-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND28P0000400" status="valid">
			<ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND28R0000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			<lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND4Y30000400" normprotocol="lexsee" ri.key="491204" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
			  <lnci:case>
			    <lnci:caseinfo>
			      <lnci:casename>
				<lnci:party1 name="Drane"/>
				<lnci:text txt="v."/>
				<lnci:party2 name="State"/>
			      </lnci:casename>
			      <lnci:decisiondate txt="1965"/>

			  <lnci:content>
			    <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/cases/urn:contentItem:3S3J-WXJ0-003G-32XR-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">

				</parameters>
				<linktext> <emph typestyle="un" xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">Drane v. State</emph>, 29 Wis. 2d 208, 211 n.4, 138 N.W.2d 273 (1965)</linktext>
			      </request>
			    </linktemplate:linktemplate>
			  </lnci:content>
			</lnci:cite>
		      </rfc:anchorcite>. </rfc:reasonforciting></rfc:reasonforciting><rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND29C0000400" xmlns:rfc="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/legal/reason-for-citing/1/"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND29C0000400_2" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>The existence of random, albeit frequent, criminal conduct in one's vicinity does not qualify as a "natural physical force" under the law. <emph typestyle="un">See </emph><rfc:anchorcite lni="3WPP-T3S0-0039-44D3-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND29C0000400" status="valid">
		      <ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND28T0000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		      <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND4YC0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND4TN0000400" normprotocol="lexsee" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
			<lnci:case>

	      </p>
	      <p xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">
		<ref:anchor id="para_34" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		<text>
		  <ref:page num="21" page-scheme="7490" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> <rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND29F0000400" xmlns:rfc="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/legal/reason-for-citing/1/"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND29F0000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/><ref:page num="P31" page-scheme="3481" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> Similarly, <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND4YH0000400" normcite="WIS. STAT. 939.45" normprotocol="lexstat" ri.key="41918360034" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
		      <lnci:stat>
			<lnci:statinfo>
			  <lnci:hier>
			    <lnci:hierlev label="section" num="939.45">
			      <lnci:hierlev label="subsection" num="2"/>
			    </lnci:hierlev>
			  </lnci:hier>
			</lnci:statinfo>
			<lnci:statref normcite="_939.45(2)">
			  <lnci:standardname normpubcode="6684" value="Wis. Stat."/>
			</lnci:statref>
		      </lnci:stat>
		      <lnci:content>
			<linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/statutes-legislation/urn:contentItem:55B2-G480-004G-W2YJ-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
			  <request xmlns="">
			    <parameters>
			      <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#6684#116#000939#    45#"/>
			      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:anchoridref" fixed="_2"/>
			      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="5"/>
			      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="Wis. Stat. � 939.45"/>
			      <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360340000400"/>
			      <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10989"/>
			      <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
			    </parameters>
			    <linktext>� 939.45(2)</linktext>
			  </request>
			</linktemplate:linktemplate>
		      </lnci:content>
		    </lnci:cite>, which incorporates by reference the privileges of self-defense, defense of others, defense of property, and protection against retail <ref:page num="796" page-scheme="4922" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> theft, is not available to Hamdan. <footnote>
		      <ref:anchor id="fn_fnote11" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		      <label alt-content="n11">11</label>
		      <bodytext>
			<p>
			  <ref:anchor id="fnpara_15" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			  <text>These defenses are located within <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND5080000400" normcite="WIS. STAT. 939.48" normprotocol="lexstat" ri.key="42040300022" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
			      <lnci:stat>
				<lnci:statinfo>
				  <lnci:hier>
				    <lnci:hierlev label="section" num="939.48"/>
				  </lnci:hier>
				</lnci:statinfo>
				<lnci:statref normcite="_939.48()">
				  <lnci:standardname normpubcode="6684" value="Wis. Stat."/>
				</lnci:statref>
			      </lnci:stat>
			      <lnci:content>
				<linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/statutes-legislation/urn:contentItem:55B2-G480-004G-W2YN-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
				  <request xmlns="">
				    <parameters>
				      <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#6684#116#000939#    48#"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="5"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="Wis. Stat. � 939.48"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360FS0000400"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10989"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
				    </parameters>
				    <linktext>Wis. Stat. �� 939.48</linktext>
				  </request>
				</linktemplate:linktemplate>
			      </lnci:content>
			    </lnci:cite><lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND5090000400" normcite="WIS. STAT. 939.49" normprotocol="lexstat" ri.key="40992250027" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
			      <lnci:stat>
				<lnci:statinfo>
				  <lnci:hier>
				    <lnci:hierlev label="section" num="939.49"/>
				  </lnci:hier>
				</lnci:statinfo>
				<lnci:statref normcite="_939.49()">
				  <lnci:standardname normpubcode="6684" value="Wis. Stat."/>
				</lnci:statref>
			      </lnci:stat>
			      <lnci:content>
				<linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/statutes-legislation/urn:contentItem:55B2-G480-004G-W2YP-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
				  <request xmlns="">
				    <parameters>
				      <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#6684#116#000939#    49#"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="5"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="Wis. Stat. � 939.49"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360FT0000400"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10989"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
				    </parameters>
				    <linktext> and 939.49</linktext>
				  </request>
				</linktemplate:linktemplate>
			      </lnci:content>
			    </lnci:cite>.</text>
			</p>
		      </bodytext>
		    </footnote> In <emph typestyle="un">Nollie</emph>, we refused to recognize a privilege to carry a concealed weapon without satisfying the stringent requirements of statutory self-defense. <rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND29H0000400"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND29H0000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/><footnote>
			<ref:anchor id="fn_fnote12" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			<label alt-content="n12">12</label>
			<bodytext>
			  <p>
			    <ref:anchor id="fnpara_16" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			    <text><rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND2B90000400">
				<ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2B90000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
				<rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND2BC0000400"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2BC0000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>In <emph typestyle="un">Nollie</emph>, the defendant alleged that he took a gun out of the trunk of his car, loaded it, and put it in his waistband when he got out of the car to change his tire in a dangerous neighborhood, because he was worried that four men standing on the corner might try to rob him. <rfc:anchorcite lni="450J-11C0-0039-44CX-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND2B90000400" status="valid">
				    <ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2B80000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
				    <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND50C0000400" normprotocol="lexsee" ri.key="28355521" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
				      <lnci:case>
					<lnci:caseinfo>
					  <lnci:casename>
					    <lnci:party1 name="State"/>
					    <lnci:text txt="v."/>
					    <lnci:party2 name="Nollie"/>
					  </lnci:casename>
					</lnci:caseinfo>
					<lnci:caseref ID="I493DC010K1MND50D0000400">
					  <lnci:reporter normpubcode="23642" value="WI"/>
					  <lnci:ldi jumppage="4" kw="1327_2002_4*.4" page="4" pagesuffix="*" reporter="1327" volume="2002"/>
					  <lnci:volume num="2002"/>
					  <lnci:page num="4"/>
					  <lnci:pinpoint num="P8"/>
					</lnci:caseref>
					<lnci:caseref ID="I493DC010K1MND50J0000400">
					  <lnci:reporter normpubcode="111" value="Wis. 2d"/>
					  <lnci:ldi jumppage="538" kw="2005_249_538*.538" page="538" pagesuffix="*" reporter="2005" volume="249"/>
					  <lnci:volume num="249"/>
					  <lnci:page num="538"/>
					</lnci:caseref>
					<lnci:caseref ID="I493DC010K1MND50M0000400">
					  <lnci:reporter normpubcode="630" value="N.W.2d"/>
					  <lnci:ldi jumppage="280" kw="1572_638_280*.280" page="280" pagesuffix="*" reporter="1572" volume="638"/>
					  <lnci:volume num="638"/>
					  <lnci:page num="280"/>
					</lnci:caseref>
					<lnci:caseref ID="I493DDGK0K1MND20F0000400" exclude="1" generated="1">
					  <lnci:reporter normpubcode="4135" value="Wisc. LEXIS"/>
					  <lnci:volume num="2002"/>
					  <lnci:page num="3"/>
					</lnci:caseref>
				      </lnci:case>
				      <lnci:content>
					<linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/cases/urn:contentItem:450J-11C0-0039-44CX-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
					  <request xmlns="">
					    <parameters>
					      <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#23642#2#2002#000004#"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:anchoridref" fixed="PNUM_8_3481"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="21"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:kw-fallback-substring" fixed="#23642#2#2002#"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="2002 WI 4"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:pinpoint" fixed="8"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360FW0000400"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10983"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
					    </parameters>
					    <linktext> <emph typestyle="un" xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">State v. Nollie</emph>, 2002 WI 4, P8, 249 Wis. 2d 538, 638 N.W.2d 280</linktext>
					  </request>
					</linktemplate:linktemplate>
				      </lnci:content>
				    </lnci:cite>
				  </rfc:anchorcite>. Nollie had been the victim of several crimes in the neighborhood, including an armed robbery in which he had been physically assaulted. <rfc:anchorcite lni="450J-11C0-0039-44CX-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND2BC0000400" status="valid">
				    <ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2BB0000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
				    <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND50R0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND50C0000400" normprotocol="lexsee" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
				      <lnci:case>
					<lnci:caseref ID="I493DC010K1MND50P0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND50D0000400">
					  <lnci:ldi jumppage="4" kw="1327_2002_4*.4" page="4" pagesuffix="*" reporter="1327" volume="2002"/>
					  <lnci:pinpoint num="P7"/>
					</lnci:caseref>
					<lnci:caseref ID="I493DDGK0K1MND25M0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND50J0000400" exclude="1" generated="1">
					  <lnci:ldi jumppage="538" kw="2005_249_538*.538" page="538" pagesuffix="*" reporter="2005" volume="249"/>
					</lnci:caseref>
					<lnci:caseref ID="I493DDGK0K1MND25N0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND50M0000400" exclude="1" generated="1">
					  <lnci:ldi jumppage="280" kw="1572_638_280*.280" page="280" pagesuffix="*" reporter="1572" volume="638"/>
					</lnci:caseref>
					<lnci:caseref ID="I493DDGK0K1MND25P0000400" anaphref="I493DDGK0K1MND20F0000400" exclude="1" generated="1"/>
				      </lnci:case>
				      <lnci:content>
					<linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/cases/urn:contentItem:450J-11C0-0039-44CX-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
					  <request xmlns="">
					    <parameters>
					      <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#23642#2#2002#000004#"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:anchoridref" fixed="PNUM_7_3481"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="21"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:kw-fallback-substring" fixed="#23642#2#2002#"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="2002 WI 4"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:pinpoint" fixed="7"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360G00000400"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10983"/>
					      <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
					    </parameters>
					    <linktext> <emph typestyle="un" xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">Id.</emph>, P7</linktext>
					  </request>
					</linktemplate:linktemplate>
				      </lnci:content>
				    </lnci:cite>
				  </rfc:anchorcite>. </rfc:reasonforciting>
			      </rfc:reasonforciting>We held that to sustain a claim of self-defense the defendant must show that: </text>
			    <blockquote>
			      <p>
				<ref:anchor id="fnpara_17" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
				<text>(1) the defendant had an actual and reasonable belief that there was an actual or imminent unlawful interference with the defendant's person; (2) the defendant had the actual and reasonable belief that the threat or use of force was necessary; and (3) that the defendant used only such threat or force as he actually and reasonably believed was necessary. </text>
			      </p>
			    </blockquote>
			  </p>
			  <p>
			    <ref:anchor id="fnpara_18" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			    <text>
			      <rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND2C50000400"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2C50000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/><rfc:anchorcite lni="450J-11C0-0039-44CX-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND2C50000400" status="valid">
				  <ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2BD0000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
				  <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND50T0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND50C0000400" loadable="1" normprotocol="lexsee" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
				    <lnci:case>
				      <lnci:caseref ID="I493DC010K1MND50S0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND50D0000400">
					<lnci:ldi jumppage="4" kw="1327_2002_4*.4" page="4" pagesuffix="*" reporter="1327" volume="2002"/>
					<lnci:pinpoint num="P19"/>
				      </lnci:caseref>
				      <lnci:caseref ID="I493DDGK0K1MND25R0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND50J0000400" exclude="1" generated="1">
					<lnci:ldi jumppage="538" kw="2005_249_538*.538" page="538" pagesuffix="*" reporter="2005" volume="249"/>
				      </lnci:caseref>
				      <lnci:caseref ID="I493DDGK0K1MND25S0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND50M0000400" exclude="1" generated="1">
					<lnci:ldi jumppage="280" kw="1572_638_280*.280" page="280" pagesuffix="*" reporter="1572" volume="638"/>
				      </lnci:caseref>
				      <lnci:caseref ID="I493DDGK0K1MND25T0000400" anaphref="I493DDGK0K1MND20F0000400" exclude="1" generated="1"/>
				    </lnci:case>
				    <lnci:content>

		      </rfc:anchorcite>. </rfc:reasonforciting></rfc:reasonforciting>
		  <rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND29H0000400" xmlns:rfc="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/legal/reason-for-citing/1/"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND29H0000400_2" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/><ref:page num="455" page-scheme="3491" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> We held that the defendant's assertions that he was in a high crime neighborhood, that he was in a vulnerable position while changing his tire, and that he was faced with a potential threat (four young men were allegedly nearby, being loud and profane) were insufficient to constitute an imminent and specific threat under the self-defense privilege statute. <rfc:anchorcite lni="450J-11C0-0039-44CX-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND29H0000400" status="valid">

	      <p xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">
		<ref:anchor id="para_35" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		<text>
		  <ref:page num="22" page-scheme="7490" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> <rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND2C70000400" xmlns:rfc="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/legal/reason-for-citing/1/"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2C70000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/><ref:page num="P32" page-scheme="3481" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> Hamdan argues that the concerns that inspired him to carry a concealed weapon in his store were specific and imminent, based on his past experiences with crime and the high incidence of crime in the neighborhood, thus making his actions privileged. <emph typestyle="un">Nollie</emph> made it clear, however, that such general assertions are insufficient to support a defense of privilege. As we stated, "To allow an individual to claim self-defense under such circumstances would essentially allow anyone walking in a 'high crime neighborhood' to conceal a weapon--a situation that . . . would eviscerate the legislature's intent in making carrying a concealed weapon a crime." <rfc:anchorcite lni="450J-11C0-0039-44CX-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND2C70000400" status="valid">
		      <ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2C60000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		      <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND50X0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND50C0000400" normprotocol="lexsee" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
			<lnci:case>
			  <lnci:caseref ID="I493DC010K1MND50W0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND50D0000400">
			    <lnci:ldi jumppage="4" kw="1327_2002_4*.4" page="4" pagesuffix="*" reporter="1327" volume="2002"/>
			    <lnci:pinpoint num="P26"/>
			  </lnci:caseref>
			  <lnci:caseref ID="I493DDGK0K1MND25V0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND50J0000400" exclude="1" generated="1">
			    <lnci:ldi jumppage="538" kw="2005_249_538*.538" page="538" pagesuffix="*" reporter="2005" volume="249"/>
			  </lnci:caseref>
			  <lnci:caseref ID="I493DDGK0K1MND25W0000400" anaphref="I493DC010K1MND50M0000400" exclude="1" generated="1">
			    <lnci:ldi jumppage="280" kw="1572_638_280*.280" page="280" pagesuffix="*" reporter="1572" volume="638"/>
			  </lnci:caseref>
			  <lnci:caseref ID="I493DDGK0K1MND25X0000400" anaphref="I493DDGK0K1MND20F0000400" exclude="1" generated="1"/>
			</lnci:case>
			<lnci:content>
			  <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/cases/urn:contentItem:450J-11C0-0039-44CX-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">

				<parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10983"/>

			      </parameters>

		      <rfc:anchorheadnote anchorheadnotetoken="I4F247V40K1MND1XM0000400" seqnum="10"/>
		    </rfc:anchorcite>. </rfc:reasonforciting>
		  <footnote>
		    <ref:anchor id="fn_fnote13" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		    <label alt-content="n13">13</label>
		    <bodytext>
		      <p>
			<ref:anchor id="fnpara_19" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			<text>
			  <rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND2C90000400" xmlns:rfc="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/legal/reason-for-citing/1/"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2C90000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>The incident at issue in <emph typestyle="un">Nollie</emph> occurred on April 1, 1999, after the enactment of <lnci:cite ID="I494BP8P0K1MND0WP0000400" loadable="1" normcite="WIS. CONST. 1 25" normprotocol="lexstat" ri.key="42762490028" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
			      <lnci:constitution>
				<lnci:constinfo>

				    </lnci:hierlev>
				  </lnci:hier>
				</lnci:constinfo>
				<lnci:constref normcite="1_25">
				  <lnci:standardname normpubcode="6748" value="Wis. Const."/>
				</lnci:constref>
			      </lnci:constitution>
			      <lnci:content>
				<linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/statutes-legislation/urn:contentItem:55B2-G3X0-004G-W34X-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
				  <request xmlns="">
				    <parameters>
				      <parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#6748#128#000001#000025#"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="39"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="WI Const 1,25"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360G30000400"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="139255"/>
				      <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
				    </parameters>
				    <linktext>Article I, Section 25</linktext>
				  </request>
				</linktemplate:linktemplate>
			      </lnci:content>
			    </lnci:cite>. <rfc:anchorcite lni="450J-11C0-0039-44CX-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND2C90000400" status="valid">
			      <ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2C80000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			      <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND5100000400" normprotocol="lexsee" ri.key="28355521" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">

				    </lnci:casename>
				  </lnci:caseinfo>
				  <lnci:caseref ID="I493DC010K1MND5110000400">
				    <lnci:reporter normpubcode="23642" value="WI"/>
				    <lnci:ldi jumppage="4" kw="1327_2002_4*.4" page="4" pagesuffix="*" reporter="1327" volume="2002"/>
				    <lnci:volume num="2002"/>
				    <lnci:page num="4"/>
				  </lnci:caseref>
				  <lnci:caseref ID="I493DC010K1MND5130000400">
				    <lnci:reporter normpubcode="111" value="Wis. 2d"/>
				    <lnci:ldi jumppage="538" kw="2005_249_538*.538" page="538" pagesuffix="*" reporter="2005" volume="249"/>
				    <lnci:volume num="249"/>
				    <lnci:page num="538"/>
				    <lnci:pinpoint num="P3"/>
				  </lnci:caseref>
				  <lnci:caseref ID="I493DC010K1MND5170000400">
				    <lnci:reporter normpubcode="630" value="N.W.2d"/>
				    <lnci:ldi jumppage="280" kw="1572_638_280*.280" page="280" pagesuffix="*" reporter="1572" volume="638"/>
				    <lnci:volume num="638"/>
				    <lnci:page num="280"/>
				  </lnci:caseref>
				  <lnci:caseref ID="I493DDGK0K1MND20G0000400" exclude="1" generated="1">
				    <lnci:reporter normpubcode="4135" value="Wisc. LEXIS"/>
				    <lnci:volume num="2002"/>
				    <lnci:page num="3"/>
				  </lnci:caseref>
				</lnci:case>
				<lnci:metadata>
				  <lnci:precedent>
				    <lnci:editletter ID="I494K3WC0K1MND0W10000400" appliedby="human" comment="Explained by" letter="e"/>
				  </lnci:precedent>
				</lnci:metadata>
				<lnci:content>
				  <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/cases/urn:contentItem:450J-11C0-0039-44CX-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">
				    <request xmlns="">
				      <parameters>
					<parameter style="query" name="CITE-REF" fixed="#23642#2#2002#000004#"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="21"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="cfi:kw-fallback-substring" fixed="#23642#2#2002#"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="2002 WI 4"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360G40000400"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10983"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
				      </parameters>
				      <linktext> <emph typestyle="un" xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">Nollie</emph>, 2002 WI 4, 249 Wis. 2d 538, P3, 638 N.W.2d 280</linktext>
				    </request>
				  </linktemplate:linktemplate>
				</lnci:content>
			      </lnci:cite>
			      <rfc:anchorheadnote anchorheadnotetoken="I4F247V40K1MND1XN0000400" seqnum="8"/>
			    </rfc:anchorcite>. However, no constitutional argument was raised by the parties and, thus, there was no discussion of the amendment's effect on the statutory privilege of self-defense relative to the CCW statute.</rfc:reasonforciting>
			</text>
		      </p>
		    </bodytext>
		  </footnote>
		</text>
	      </p>
	      <p xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">
		<ref:anchor id="para_36" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
		<text><ref:page num="23" page-scheme="7490" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> <ref:page num="456" page-scheme="3491" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> <ref:page num="P33" page-scheme="3481" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> We have little doubt that the dangers facing Hamdan while operating his store were genuine. However, he did not face specific and imminent threats on the night of November 26, 1999, merely because of the location of his store in a high-crime neighborhood and his past victimization by criminal activity. The statutory elements of <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND5190000400" normcite="WIS. 		  </lnci:cite> contemplate the actual presence of an unlawful interference, which was absent in this case. <footnote>

			    </rfc:anchorcite>. We merely note that the facts of Hamdan's case are not amenable to any defense of privilege under <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND51S0000400" normcite="WIS. STAT. 939.45" normprotocol="lexstat" ri.key="43162580029" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">

	      </p>
	      <p xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">

STAT. 939.45" normprotocol="lexstat" ri.key="44923190030" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">

		      <lnci:content>
			<linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/statutes-legislation/urn:contentItem:55B2-G480-004G-W2YJ-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">

			      <parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R3603G0000400"/>
			      <parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10989"/>
			      <parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
			    </parameters>
			    <linktext>� 939.45(6)</linktext>
			  </request>
			</linktemplate:linktemplate>
		      </lnci:content>
		    </lnci:cite>, which provides for a defense when "the actor's conduct is privileged by the statutory or common law of this<ref:page num="24" page-scheme="7490" page-scheme-type="reporter-series-code" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/> state." He asserts either a common law privilege, such as the one this court recognized in <rfc:anchorcite lni="3RSV-Y7F0-003G-30B5-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND2DH0000400" status="valid">

			    <lnci:reporter normpubcode="4135" value="Wisc. LEXIS"/>
			    <lnci:volume num="1996"/>
			    <lnci:page num="114"/>
			  </lnci:caseref>
			</lnci:case>
			<lnci:content>
			  <linktemplate:linktemplate rel="http://services.lexisnexis.com/shared/linkrelations/CITE-REF" href="/shared/document/cases/urn:contentItem:3RSV-Y7F0-003G-30B5-00000-00" type="application/xhtml+xml" domain="services" xmlns:linktemplate="services.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/linktemplate/1/">

			      </parameters>
			      <linktext> <emph typestyle="un" xmlns="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/base/1/">State v. Coleman</emph>, 206 Wis. 2d 199, 556 N.W.2d 701 (1996)</linktext>
			    </request>
			  </linktemplate:linktemplate>
			</lnci:content>
		      </lnci:cite>
		      <rfc:anchorheadnote anchorheadnotetoken="I4F247V40K1MND1XS0000400" seqnum="2"/>
		    </rfc:anchorcite>, <footnote>

		      <bodytext>
			<p>
			  <ref:anchor id="fnpara_21" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>
			  <text>
			    <rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND2J20000400"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2J20000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/>The defendant in <emph typestyle="un">Coleman</emph> was arrested as a felon in possession of a firearm, contrary to <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND5220000400" normcite="WIS. STAT. 941.29" normprotocol="lexstat" ri.key="43108550024" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
				<lnci:stat>

				  </lnci:statref>

				<lnci:content>

				    <request xmlns="">
				      <parameters>

					<parameter style="query" name="cfi:anchoridref" fixed="_2"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="cfi:contentclasscode" fixed="5"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="cfi:normcite" fixed="Wis. Stat. � 941.29"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="spanid" fixed="I56N5HD52N1R360GD0000400"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="contentcomponentid" fixed="10989"/>
					<parameter style="query" name="priceplan" fixed="subscriptions"/>
				      </parameters>
				      <linktext>Wis. Stat. � 941.29(2)</linktext>
				    </request>
				  </linktemplate:linktemplate>
				</lnci:content>
			      </lnci:cite>, when police discovered him with a firearm subsequent to a raid on his girlfriend's apartment. <rfc:reasonforciting rfctoken="I4F246TY0K1MND2J40000400"><ref:anchor id="I4F246TY0K1MND2J40000400" xmlns:ref="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/reference/1/"/><rfc:anchorcite lni="3RSV-Y7F0-003G-30B5-00000-00" rfctokenref="I4F246TY0K1MND2J20000400" status="valid">

				  <lnci:cite ID="I493DC010K1MND5240000400" normprotocol="lexsee" ri.key="6427727" status="valid" xmlns:lnci="http://www.lexisnexis.com/xmlschemas/content/shared/citations/1/">
